channel.title: I can't play/run 317 or 508 servers someone help! please
channel.description:
i've been having alot of problems with my computer's java, i can't host my own 317 server or 508 server. and i canot play on some 317 servers and i can never play on a 508 server. everytime i try to host a 317 or 508 it says something like this." cannot find java 5.0 or 6.0". when i try to play a 317/508 server and i click "run" it says something like this."java is not a reconized as an internal or external command,opperable program or batch file". if anyone can tell me how to fix this it would be great =] i have aim and msn. please reply i will check this thread frequently.
for those who do not want to read.
1. I cannot play/host 317 or 508 servers,because my computer says java is not reconized or i do not have update 5 or 6 when i did download it. 2. someone please help me fix this, because i want to host my own 508 server because rs is getting boring to me, and since 508 servers are just the same it make sit fun again. 3. i have msn and aim if you would want to talk that way, personally would be alot faster!.
Thanks, ScatMan.

i have some one helping me now so…

item.title: I can't play/run 317 or 508 servers someone help! please
item.dc:creator: @bite_the_man bite the man
item.description:
@bite_the_man wrote:

dude…if u dont want to download anything new…post this in ur run.bat

it will go with the java u have now

@echo off title Title Name Here cd ../build "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" net/com/codeusa/Server 43594 pause

Read full topic

item.title: I can't play/run 317 or 508 servers someone help! please
item.dc:creator: @madbob420 madbob420
item.description:
@madbob420 wrote:

Yes,
What you speak is entirely true. But if you download JDK13 u 6.
Then, restart your PC you wont have to set the ClassPaths.

Read full topic
item.source: I can't play/run 317 or 508 servers someone help! please

item.title: I can't play/run 317 or 508 servers someone help! please
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

[quote=“madbob420, post:7, topic:283580”]I don’t care what anyone says you don’t need to set your ClassPath veriables or nothing like that when you install JDK13 u 6.
All you do is download JDK13 with JRE then, you restart your PC. Then you’re PC will be able to compile… Yes you were right where I put “1.6.0_13” you shouldent have to edit that at all if you have JDK13 with JRE. Just restart your PC an it should run if not let me know and I can assist you futher ok. I hope this is helpful :)[/quote]

What the hell? If you set your path and classpath variables, correctly, it allows you to use the ‘javac’ and ‘java’ commands, rather than entering a destination into your batch file. There’s a tut, in the tutorial section, that’s stickied and hard to miss, about starting a server. Or, you could google environment variables.

Read full topic
item.source: I can't play/run 317 or 508 servers someone help! please

item.title: I can't play/run 317 or 508 servers someone help! please
item.dc:creator: @madbob420 madbob420
item.description:
@madbob420 wrote:

I don’t care what anyone says you don’t need to set your ClassPath veriables or nothing like that when you install JDK13 u 6.
All you do is download JDK13 with JRE then, you restart your PC. Then you’re PC will be able to compile… Yes you were right where I put “1.6.0_13” you shouldent have to edit that at all if you have JDK13 with JRE. Just restart your PC an it should run if not let me know and I can assist you futher ok. I hope this is helpful

Read full topic
item.source: I can't play/run 317 or 508 servers someone help! please

item.title: I can't play/run 317 or 508 servers someone help! please
item.dc:creator: @unknownpking.no-ip.b unknownpking.no-ip.biz
item.description:
@unknownpking.no-ip.b wrote:

ok, i just download java update 13, so instead of the 14 i put 13 in that place?

[quote=“frogtamer101, post:4, topic:283580”]I think it may be helpful to make a path and a classpath in your enviromental variables. There are many tutorials if you just search it up on google on how to make a runescape private server. And also if you do have jdk installed it should be 1.6.0_14 so I would check your compiler and see if it is set to that under its path otherwise it wontfind the java.exe and It doesnt say java is not recognized as an internal/external command if im not mistaken it says JAVAC make sure correct me if Im wrong and this happens all the time. Im no profesional with compilers or run.bat but all I do is search for a good compiler on once again googel and repaste that on my compiler and put my right jdk path in it. HOPE THIS HELPED

Oh and to check your java just to make sure its what I said. Go to My Computer(for xp) And then click programfiles folder. Then Java. Now what you will see is a folder named jdk then some numbersand that would be your version of jk for just regular old java its the toher folder[/quote]
when i go into the varible thing which one do i make the classpath and path in? the user varibles or system varibals?

also i’m gonna post some pics of my problems so please help me =/

Read full topic
item.source: I can't play/run 317 or 508 servers someone help! please

item.title: I can't play/run 317 or 508 servers someone help! please
item.dc:creator: @madbob420 madbob420
item.description:
@madbob420 wrote:

Please Past the following…

317 Run.Bat:

@echo off
title Title Name Here
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

508 Run.Bat:

@echo off
title Title Name Here
cd ../build
"C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_13\bin\java.exe" net/com/codeusa/Server 43594
pause

Hope this helped.

Read full topic
item.source: I can't play/run 317 or 508 servers someone help! please

item.title: I can't play/run 317 or 508 servers someone help! please
item.dc:creator: @frogtamer101 frogtamer101
item.description:
@frogtamer101 wrote:

I think it may be helpful to make a path and a classpath in your enviromental variables. There are many tutorials if you just search it up on google on how to make a runescape private server. And also if you do have jdk installed it should be 1.6.0_14 so I would check your compiler and see if it is set to that under its path otherwise it wontfind the java.exe and It doesnt say java is not recognized as an internal/external command if im not mistaken it says JAVAC make sure correct me if Im wrong and this happens all the time. Im no profesional with compilers or run.bat but all I do is search for a good compiler on once again googel and repaste that on my compiler and put my right jdk path in it. HOPE THIS HELPED

Oh and to check your java just to make sure its what I said. Go to My Computer(for xp) And then click programfiles folder. Then Java. Now what you will see is a folder named jdk then some numbersand that would be your version of jk for just regular old java its the toher folder

Read full topic
item.source: I can't play/run 317 or 508 servers someone help! please
